rows.label: qst300101_msg001
rows.name:
Hey. Good timing.
There's something I wanted
to talk with you guys about.

rows.label: qst300101_msg002
rows.name:
Our little mercenary band's been
getting more and more jobs lately.
I'm thinking we need to expand.

rows.label: qst300101_msg003
rows.name:
But to do that, we'll need more
resources than we have right now.

rows.label: qst300101_msg004
rows.name:
A lot of jobs require traveling, and
that means taking rations, medicine,
maintenance and camping tools...

rows.label: qst300101_msg005
rows.name:
More supplies than I can list, to be
frank. I'd like to enlist your help
collecting some of them.

rows.label: qst300101_msg006
rows.name:
With more supplies, we'll be able to
send more members on missions
instead of leaving them sitting idle.

rows.label: qst300101_msg007
rows.name:
For more details, talk to Zuo.
He's our supplies specialist.
You'll find him outside the warehouse.

rows.label: qst300101_msg101
rows.name:
For info on what we need to collect,
ask Zuo. He's outside the warehouse.

rows.label: qst300101_msg203
rows.name: I heard you were a real hero out there!

rows.label: qst300101_msg204
rows.name:
Must've been tough fighting that many
at once. You really saved our bacon!

rows.label: qst300101_msg205
rows.name:
It can't have been easy, collecting
all those food supplies. Everyone
was thrilled to see it!

rows.label: qst300101_msg206
rows.name:
Having to run this mercenary band
by ourselves has taught me a lot.

rows.label: qst300101_msg207
rows.name:
Not least just how much Vandham
really did for us when he was around.

rows.label: qst300101_msg208
rows.name:
We've still got a long way to go
before we can live up to him...

rows.label: qst300101_msg209
rows.name:
Ah, sorry. Didn't mean to turn this
into some kind of sob story.

rows.label: qst300101_msg210
rows.name:
At any rate, thanks to your help,
we'll be able to expand our activities.

rows.label: qst300101_msg211
rows.name:
Let's all keep doing what we can
to carry on what Vandham started!

rows.label: qst300101_msg212
rows.name:
If there's anything else we need,
I'll let you know. We're counting
on you guys!
